items.sentence: Tom and Mary went outside to watch the fireworks.
Tom got upset when he found out Mary was leaving.
You ought to let Tom know that Mary will do that.
Didn\'t you know Tom and I often travel together?
Tom was fired from his job and his wife left him.
The doctor told Mary she couldn\'t have children.
I won\'t be able to tell you about what happened.
I\'m pretty sure they won\'t allow us to do that.
I have to help Tom do something tomorrow morning.
I have work to do, so go away and leave me alone.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t want to do that.
Tom wanted to take Mary in his arms and kiss her.
Tom wants to ask you some questions about French.
You should try to encourage Tom to do that again.
Tom woke up the next day with a painful hangover.
There\'s something important Tom didn\'t tell us.
I thought that you said that you weren\'t afraid.
Tom saw Mary looking at him from across the room.
Tom saw what he was looking for on the top shelf.
Tom never saw any wolves, but he could hear them.
